_sText:
On 2312, after the disaster with the zombies on Earth, the humans decided to make their experiences with undead people in the space. They evacuated the Xblah Mothership to make government only experiences. But an undead escaped from his jail, and them started to infect everyone there.

Now the solution is with you!

Kill all the zombies, be infected, or blow up the Xblah Mothership.
